column3: Jakob fifo fii ananaben man mu no;"
na oguanee; Jordan so wɔsaan no ekyir."
ebɛnadze yɛ wo na iruguan yi? Ɔwo Jordan
na hom ruhuruhuruw dɛ nguannyin; Na hom nkokwaa

column4: Wɔ Jakob ne Nyankopɔn no enyim."

column2: "Ɔno a ɔdaan ɔbotan no yɛɛ nsutaae
column3: Ɔtwerɛbo no yɛɛ no nsunyiwa no."
